item.description:
Time for another fast-paced hike.  Instead of heading to the gym, this fast-paced walk is aimed to get our heart rate going.  You should be able to walk just short of jogging pace for 3hours to join this meet up.

 

This event is offered to both "Hike the Medford Fells" and the "Random Group of Hikers" with 4 spots for sign up for each group (for a total of 9 hikers).  Please only sign up for this event once, even if you are a member of both meet up groups.

 

The plan is to walk the Skyline trail (approx 7.5mi) in under 2hours.  Bring 2.5hours of your time with you in case we are slower due to the weather and ground conditions.  Also, as we may be dealing with frozen ground and ice, you MUST bring microspikes or sth. similar.  The trail has plenty of rocks that may be slippery.

 

Bring something to drink (and possibly eat). To clarify: this is a workout, not a conversational meetup. Please do NOT sign up for this hike if you are unable to walk just short of jogging pace for 3hours.

 

We will be leaving the parking lot at 10:05am and plan to return to the parking lot by 12:05pm.

 

Please do NOT join this meet up if you do not jog/run regularly and are confident that you can walk at a fast pace for a few hours.  This is a fast-paced hike.  No break scheduled during this loop hike.  

 

Looking forward to our hike!

 

 

Random Group of Hikers Disclaimer

As a condition of your voluntary participation in this activity you acknowledge and agree to the following: this activity involves inherent risks that can cause property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death to participants and/or others; you assume all risk associated with this activity; you are responsible for having the necessary knowledge, skills, abilities, clothing, and equipment to safely participate in this activity; you know and will follow the Hiker Responsibility Code; the organizer(s) of this activity are volunteers; and you release, hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death - including those caused by negligence and/or other reasons.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be standing at the board next toe the start of the trail.
item.name: Fast-paced Skyline Hike in the Middlesex Fells
